name: Achar Oiro
title: Achar Oiro | AWS Community Builder & Cloud Engineer
description: Learn AWS, Kubernetes, and healthcare cloud architecture from an AWS Community Builder with clinical background. Practical tutorials, HIPAA compliance guides, and career transition stories.

author.name: Achar Oiro
author.title: AWS Community Builder & Cloud Engineer
author.bio: Clinical Officer turned Cloud Engineer. AWS Community Builder helping healthcare teams build secure, HIPAA-compliant cloud infrastructure.

features.title: AWS & Cloud Engineering
features.description: Master AWS services, architecture patterns, and best practices from real-world projects

features.title: Healthcare Technology
features.description: Build HIPAA-compliant systems with cloud security and patient data protection

features.title: Kubernetes & KCNA
features.description: Learn container orchestration, networking fundamentals, and certification prep

features.title: Career Transition
features.description: Navigate the path from healthcare to tech with practical guidance and resources
